PM1AUD.original: ~z~Some guys I know have checked you out as well.
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~我认识的人也已经调查过你了。

PM1AUD.original: ~z~Word to the wise, though - she don't put out.
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~给你个忠告先——她不会上床的。

PM1AUD.original: ~z~Unless you're hoping to see me sis again?
~z~You'd be touched if you did some time, that's for sure.
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~你要是来了肯定有人敢动你，毋庸置疑。

PM1AUD.original: ~z~Not so much of the "fun in the shower" that you guys have here in America.
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~那边可没你们美国的这种「肥皂时间」。

PM1AUD.original: ~z~Will do. Might even put you on the visitors list.
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~我会的。说不定还会让你上探监名单。

PM1AUD.original: ~z~As I said, the whole prison bitch thing is an American phenomenon.
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~我说了，这种狗屁监狱风气是美国特色。

PM1AUD.original: ~z~Am I going to hear this story?
~z~We would see if they'd be able to touch me, I got some moves.
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~那你等着看他们能不能动我吧，我还是有两下子的。

PM1AUD.original: ~z~I do and I don't if you know what I mean?
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~既有又没有，能明白我意思吗？

PM1AUD.original: ~z~He's an absolute savior. Couldn't have done it without him.
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~他绝对是个大救星。没他这票干不成。

PM1AUD.original: ~z~I'm going to pass on that. Send me a postcard if you do some time.
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~我就算了吧。等你进去了给我寄张明信片就成。

PM1AUD.original: ~z~You're a good man, Niko. I like you.
~z~Oh, there he is, Mr. fucking crazy man...
~z~Bet a guy like you thought he was going to be real popular with the lifers.
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~我看你这样的人肯定很受无期犯的欢迎。

PM1AUD.original: ~z~Hell, I didn't think I was coming out here with a special needs kid.
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~靠，真没想到我会和一个残疾人一起来这儿。

PM1AUD.original: ~z~Good thing I enjoy a good ruck.
~z~See those boxes on the back of the boat? They must be bringing cloned meds.
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~看见船后面装着的那些箱子了吗？他们一定是在走私仿制药。

PM1AUD.original: ~z~And here's the boat, right on time.
~z~That's if we're ever going to get out of this fuckin' jam. Put your foot down, man.
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~要是没被堵在这儿好运就该显灵了。油门踩下去，兄弟。

PM1AUD.original: ~z~Well, you've got to do some time over here. See what you've been missing out on in your chaste European jails.
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~那你改天一定要来试试。补上在欧洲禁欲监狱错过的经历。

PM1AUD.original: ~z~Not in a "fun in the showers" kind of way. In a male bonding, about to go rob some people, kind of way.
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~不是「肥皂时间」那种喜欢。是男人的情谊，有点像一起去打劫的那种感觉。

PM1AUD.original: ~z~Something smellin' fishy means that it ain't quite right.
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~闻到气味的意思是不太对头。

PM1AUD.original: ~z~Fuck me, that did not look pretty.
~z~I get here on my own time.
~z~Fuck off. We just want the damn shipment.
~z~Did no one pay you any attention?
~z~Sure, sure, guy like you. You'd have a good time.
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~当然，当然，像你这样的，肯定能享受到的。

PM1AUD.original: ~z~about a big shipment coming in near the fish market.
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~有一条往鱼市附近来的大鱼。

PM1AUD.original: ~z~And this is my sister. Lovely lass.
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~然后这个是我妹妹，可爱的少女。

PM1AUD.original: ~z~There's a billion of these motherfuckers back in China, they won't miss a few.
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~There's a billion of these motherfuckers back in China, they won't miss a few.(BETA)

PM1AUD.original: ~z~So, you got yourself a girlfriend, Packie?
~z~I think I know what you are saying.
~z~well, probably a good thing... we got some business to take care of.
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~可能这样也好...刚好有点活儿要干。

PM1AUD.original: ~z~and you, Kate, fuck off outta here.
~z~I thought you had the luck of the Irish?
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~你不是该有爱尔兰人的好运的吗？

PM1AUD.original: ~z~You're going to hurt yourself if you keep that up, boy.
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~再这样下去你要受伤的，小子。

PM1AUD.original: ~z~So, this shipment smellin' fishy means that it ain't gonna be what they say it is.
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~所以呢，「闻到这批货的气味」就是说这批货跟他们报关的不一样。

PM1AUD.original: ~z~I'll cover you from up here while you're down on the ground cleaning up.
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~我在上面掩护，你就去下面清人。

PM1AUD.original: ~z~The triads are expecting something and it smells fishy.
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~三合会在谋划什么，已经有人闻到气味了。

PM1AUD.original: ~z~Take some of your anti depressants if you're that damn upset about us robbing ya.
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~你们要是不高兴被抢了，就吃点自己的抗抑郁药吧！

PM1AUD.original: ~z~But aren't you going to introduce us?
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~你不打算帮我们介绍一下吗？

PM1AUD.original: ~z~Put that in your wok and fry it.
~z~Ha. You're a perceptive guy. I got the lowdown on you from Elizabeta.
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~哈，你的观察力可真敏锐。你的底细我都从Elizabeta地方弄来了。

PM1AUD.original: ~z~I fuckin' do. It's just that we've got your fuckin' Slavic driving skills as well.
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~我是他妈有好运。不过还有你的傻逼斯拉夫车技在。

PM1AUD.original: ~z~That's the fucking problem, everyone in the neighborhood... hell, in the whole fucking city knows us.
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~那他妈就是问题所在，这一片的所有人...不是，全城的人都他妈认识我们。

PM1AUD.original: ~z~Don't have much in the way of coordination do ya?
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~你丫是不是不懂什么叫协同配合？

PM1AUD.original: ~z~I just can't be bothered with this shit.
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~我就是不能被这种狗东西惹上。(BETA)

PM1AUD.original: ~z~That depends on the life, I guess.
~z~The problem's that you'll be letting yourself in for a lifetime without getting action.
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~问题在于你会让自己这辈子都没机会做一次。

PM1AUD.original: ~z~This is import tax, deal with it.
~z~Which is convenient, 'cause if she did, I'd have to kill you.
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~这么着就很好办，因为要是她肯，我就只能杀了你了。

PM1AUD.original: ~z~Okay, there's a ship coming in and we're the welcoming party.
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~好了，今天有条货船进港，我们就去热烈欢迎一下。

PM1AUD.original: ~z~This is America, assholes. The strongest survive.
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~这就是美国，混蛋们。适者生存。(BETA)

PM1AUD.original: ~z~These better be some good fucking pills. The housewives better be grateful.
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~车里的药效果最好他妈好点。太太们也最好会感恩戴德。

PM1AUD.original: ~z~Shut up and let us rob you. Jesus.
~z~Maybe if being a drunkard doesn't work out you can be a comedian.
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~要是当个酒鬼还不够的话，你可以去说相声。

PM1AUD.original: ~z~Yeah. Stuff that'll stop housewives cutting their wrists and make their husbands get wood.
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~对。就是那种能阻止太太们割腕，还能让先生们雄起的东西。

PM1AUD.original: ~z~There's a box of grenades in here. Pass some up, Packie - I'll give them a taste of their own fireworks.
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~里边有一箱手雷。拿点给我，Packie，得让他们尝尝自家烟花的厉害。

PM1AUD.original: ~z~Shit, Niko. These cocksuckers are all over us.
~z~Tell you what, I'll snort a load of rails, fuck a lot of drunk girls,
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~你猜怎么着，我会天天吸粉，操遍喝醉的女人，

PM1AUD.original: ~z~So if this shipment is what they say it is, then it's going to smell fishy anyway.
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~要是这批货真是他们说的鱼，那它肯定会有一股鱼味啊。

PM1AUD.original: ~z~See those boxes on the back of the boat? They must be bringing cloned meds.
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~看见船后面装着的那些箱子了吗？他们一定是在走私仿制药。

PM1AUD.original: ~z~He gave us the heads up in exchange for a cut of the haul.
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~他放风给我们，自己拿点分成。

PM1AUD.original: ~z~Shut the fuck up. You think you're a right fuckin' comedian, don't ya?
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~闭嘴吧你。你丫真当自己是说相声的是吧？

PM1AUD.original: ~z~Possession is nine tenths of the law. Deal with it.
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~法律规定要征收九成。看着办吧。(BETA)

PM1AUD.original: ~z~You better be right about this shipment. If it's just fish I'm gonna be pretty irritated, Packie.
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~你最好能保证这批货没问题。要是是批腌鱼，我真的会很气的，Packie。

PM1AUD.original: ~z~What makes you think that the information is legit?
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~你怎么知道他这情报是不是真的？

PM1AUD.original: ~z~You gotta jump down there to get at 'em, man.
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~你得先跳下去才能干他们，兄弟。

PM1AUD.original: ~z~And I know what happens to a man when he ain't getting any. It ain't pretty.
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~刚好我知道男人没得做会有什么下场。没好下场的。

PM1AUD.original: ~z~This is where the deal's meant to be going down.
~z~Yeah. Stuff that'll stop housewives cutting their wrists and make their husbands get wood.
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~对。就是那种能阻止太太们割腕，还能让先生们雄起的东西。

PM1AUD.original: ~z~We'll wait until the truck is loaded then we'll take it. Simple as that.
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~等货都装车了，我们就去开走。就这么简单。

PM1AUD.original: ~z~But, if it's going to the fish market they must be saying that it's fish.
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~可是，既然要把货送到鱼市，那他们肯定得说这是鱼啊。

PM1AUD.original: ~z~All I'm saying is that we'll all be judged in the end, all of your brothers...
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~我要说的是，我们最终都会受到评判，包括你的兄弟们...

PM1AUD.original: ~z~I'm too small time to be worth setting up so the one angle he can be playing is the cash one.
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~不过我这种小人物不值得他算计，所以他的贪婪只会体现在分赃上。

PM1AUD.original: ~z~You got any drugs on you, boy?

PM1AUD.translated: ~z~这些现在是我们的了。滚蛋吧。

PM1AUD.original: ~z~Shit, we nearly had it. That was a fucking screw up if I ever saw one.
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~操，差点就得手了。这他妈是我见过的最猪的队友。

PM1AUD.original: ~z~I might give you a call sometime.
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~说不定哪天我会给你打个电话。

PM1AUD.original: ~z~This place really wasn't made with us criminals in mind.
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~这地方真不替我们这些犯罪者考虑。

PM1AUD.original: ~z~First off, I don't trust this guinea for a second.
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~首先，我从来就没信过这个意呆利佬。

PM1AUD.original: ~z~Sure is. All safe and sound. Whole truck load of it.
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~当然，稳稳当当。一卡车的货呢。

PM1AUD.original: ~z~Go back to the docks where you belong.
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~该回哪个码头就回哪个码头去。(BETA)

PM1AUD.original: ~z~Saving someone's life has got to count for something in this fucked up age we live in.
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~救人一命就算在现在这个垃圾年代也算很有意义了。

PM1AUD.original: ~z~Hurry up, you bastard. What's the problem?
~z~Oh yeah, Ray Boccino's a slimy motherfucker. The one thing you can rely on him for is greed.
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~噢对了，Ray Boccino这个狗逼狡猾得很。他只有贪婪这一点是不会变的。

PM1AUD.original: ~z~Why don't they make these places easier to break into?
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~他们就不能把这些地方造得方便闯入一点吗？

PM1AUD.original: ~z~We wouldn't be working for him if our family still had the same status it did back in the day.
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~要是我们家族还有以前全盛时期的水平，根本就不会替他干活。

PM1AUD.original: ~z~Shit, man. I keep forgetting you're not from here.
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~靠，兄弟。我又忘了你不是这里人了。

PM1AUD.original: ~z~Anyone who hangs around my family hears about the old days. Just wait.
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~和我们家族打交道的人早晚会听说那些辉煌岁月的。迟早的事。

PM1AUD.original: ~z~Scared to bits of life. And fucking off outta here right now, before I throw a fuckin' bottle at her.
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~生活中偶尔有点胆小。现在总他妈能滚蛋了吧，等老子把瓶子砸过来就晚了。

PM1AUD.original: ~z~Get away from the truck. Don't you know when you're beat?
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~离车远点。你被打都不会疼的吗？(BETA)

PM1AUD.original: ~z~That's a lesson I've learnt. Fucking Boccino said it'd be easy.
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~这次我可长记性了。狗逼Boccino说这活儿很轻松。

PM1AUD.original: ~z~That's why you're on this job with me.
~z~Come on, ain't you fit enough for this work?
~z~Don't you got other guys to help you out? You're from here, you should know everyone.
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~难不成就没别的人能帮上你了？你是本地人，人脉应该挺广的啊。

PM1AUD.original: ~z~This is Niko, some drug dealing de-fucking-generate from some armpit in Eastern Europe.
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~这位是Niko，不知道从哪个东欧粪坑里出来的贩毒蛆虫。

PM1AUD.original: ~z~Let us drive in fucking peace, you cocksuckers.
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~他妈就不能让我们慢慢开吗，狗杂种们。(BETA)

PM1AUD.original: ~z~That's great. That's just fucking great. We lost the stuff.
~z~Hey, what do you think you're doing?
~z~Don't these triads have other stuff they need to fuck with?
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~他妈这些三合会是没有别的货要进吗？

PM1AUD.original: ~z~They do not like to be robbed, I guess. Not many people do.
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~我猜他们是不喜欢被抢吧。很少有人喜欢这个。

PM1AUD.original: ~z~I think me and you could get along. I need a guy like you on our team.
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~我觉得咱俩能处得来。我们就需要你这样的人。

PM1AUD.original: ~z~Who are we welcoming and what have they got that makes this drive worth the effort?
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~我们要欢迎哪位？他们拉的货配得上我们这趟出的力吗？

PM1AUD.original: ~z~This is where the deal's meant to be going down.
~z~Where's your car, man? We need a car.
~z~Alright, Niko. You drive. I'll take out anyone who tries to follow us.
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~好了，Niko。你开车，我来解决那些想尾随我们的人。

PM1AUD.original: ~z~-I'm thinking maybe you can catch VD for both of us, Patrick.~n~-Fuck you, Katie.
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~－那就拜托你把我那份的性病也给得了吧，Patrick。~n~－去你妈的，Katie。

PM1AUD.original: ~z~Jesus Christ, I'm getting sick of these fucking triads.
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~上帝啊，老子快被这群狗逼Triads烦死了。(BETA)

PM1AUD.original: ~z~We get up on the roof of that warehouse.
~z~get into fights on a nightly basis and die young leaving a scarred, bloated corpse.
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~每晚跟人打架，英年早逝，留下一具满是伤痕的浮肿尸体。

PM1AUD.original: ~z~Take your defeat like real men. Fuck off.
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~像真男人一样承认你的败北吧。滚吧。(BETA)

PM1AUD.original: ~z~Usual for you and me maybe. The general population, I am not so sure.
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~对你我可能是家常便饭。普罗大众的话，我就不太确定了。

PM1AUD.original: ~z~We're going to Ray's lockup in Westminster off of Union Drive West.
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~我们要去Ray的车库，在Union快速路西段旁边的Westminster。

PM1AUD.original: ~z~Anyways, I was in Algonquin last night, partying with some sweet college chicks.
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~不说了，昨晚我在Algonquin和几个性感学生妹开派对。

PM1AUD.original: ~z~This ain't no fireworks display. It's a fucking assault rifle.
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~这可不是什么烟火大会。这他妈是突击步枪。(BETA)

PM1AUD.original: ~z~We're welcoming some of our cousins from the East, but we don't know what it is that they're bringing in exactly.
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~欢迎的是几个来自东方的远房亲戚。不过说实话，我们也不知道拉的是什么货。

PM1AUD.original: ~z~These better be some good fucking pills. The housewives better be grateful.
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~车里的药效果最好他妈好点。太太们也最好会感恩戴德。

PM1AUD.original: ~z~And here's the boat, right on time.
~z~Stupid Americans are trying to rob us!
~z~There should be a good view of the dock so we can scope that shit out.
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~那里应该能把码头看得一清二楚，可以好好侦查一下。

PM1AUD.original: ~z~That sound like the sort of life worth saving?
~z~My brother Gerry's had word from Ray Boccino, his Italian contact,
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~我哥Gerry从Ray Boccino那里收到的风，那是他的意大利线人，

PM1AUD.original: ~z~Stealing, gunfire, car chases, all the usual stuff.
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~偷窃、枪战、飞车，就那些家常便饭的事。

PM1AUD.original: ~z~Who's going to judge Kate? What would she win if they did? Virgin of the year?
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~谁会评判Kate？要是他们评了，Kate会得个什么奖？年度处女？

PM1AUD.original: ~z~General population. That's a prison term. You ever been inside?
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~普罗大众*，这是监狱黑话啊。你进去过？~n~(指很受狱友欢迎)

PM1AUD.original: ~z~They're taking this real serious, aren't they?

PM1AUD.translated: ~z~这些狗逼可真够持久不是吗？(BETA)

PM1AUD.original: ~z~What the hell...? Is it Chinese New Year already?
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~什么鬼...？这么快就到中国新年了吗？

PM1AUD.original: ~z~All we know is that it's worth a dollar or two.
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~只知道那批货还是值几个子儿的。

PM1AUD.original: ~z~A lotta wives and mistresses are gonna be happy when their men get a hold of those, huh?
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~家里的男人吃了这个，那些太太和情妇都会很开心的吧，哈？

PM1AUD.original: ~z~Depends on what you think is fun.
~z~I'll cover you from up here while you're down on the ground cleaning up.
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~我在上面掩护，你就去下面清人。

PM1AUD.original: ~z~You can't trust people. I only trust me family, some of them at least, and people I don't know.
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~外人不能信的。我只信任我的家人，至少信一部分，还有就是不认识的人了。

PM1AUD.original: ~z~We've got business out at the docks in Algonquin.
~z~Not in this country. In Europe. They do things different there.
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~不是在这儿，那会儿还在欧洲。他们那边不太一样。

PM1AUD.original: ~z~Whole city's gonna be hard in a few days time.
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~这几天全城都会坚挺起来的。

PM1AUD.original: ~z~My brother Gerald had word about it through this Italian, Ray Boccino.
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~我哥哥Gerald从Ray Boccino这个意大利人那里收到的风。
~z~你是专门替这些混蛋爱尔兰佬干活的？

PM1AUD.original: ~z~If that's what's going through your brain then we've got ourselves a problem.
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~要是你脑子里还在想她，那我们可就要闹掰了。

PM1AUD.original: ~z~Yeah, he'll probably try to give us a fraction of whatever this stuff's worth but it'll be a fun night.
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~对，甭管这批货值多少钱，估计他都只会给我们一点零头，不过今晚会很有乐子的。

PM1AUD.original: ~z~We'll wait until the truck is loaded then we'll take it. Simple as that.
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~等货都装车了，我们就去开走。就这么简单。

PM1AUD.original: ~z~Fuck off back to Chinatown or wherever you triads hang out.
PM1AUD.translated: ~z~滚回唐人街去，平常在哪儿就回哪儿去。(BETA)

PM1AUD.original: ~z~It don't happen on the other side of the ocean.
